message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice, to ensure a fair distribution considering the potential inflation.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I'm not willing to give away 75% of the money. I'm hoping for a more balanced split.
Considering the rejection of my previous offer and the impact of inflation, I propose a new 45/55 split. This aims to provide a more equitable distribution while respecting the value of the currency.
I'm still not willing to give away 55% of the money. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a more balanced split.
